Reviews.Title: Indescructable!
Reviews.Author: Baby Buyer
Reviews.Content: As a high school student, my phone has been handled by many people, and i have dropped it almost every day. I have even dropped it in a gutter full of water on a rainy day, and with out a problem, it turned back on perfectly in a couple days.This phone is the best one i have had. Besides the amazing durability, it is easy to text, because the keyboard layout is the same as a computer keyboard. There are many features that are very helpful.i would recommend this phone to anyone looking for durability, and a good phone for the price that they pay.

Reviews.Title: My wife's BB
Reviews.Author: Celiano Cevallos
Reviews.Content: The product arrived on time, even though we bought a new phone, the one we received was used and works perfectly fine, it came just in a ziplock bag without the original box, instruction manual, installation CD.  We live overseas, so we decided to keep it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE The BlackBerry 8310
Reviews.Author: Adam W.
Reviews.Content: I have fallen in love with the BlackBerry and I'm planning to upgrade to the new 9300 Torch in September. I love the keypad! I can text quickly like the young kids now.LOL

Reviews.Title: Unlocked Blackberry Curve 8310
Reviews.Author: Jorge Londono
Reviews.Content: The unlocked Blacberry Curve 8310 had a reception problem working with Metro PCS and T-Mobile. It's working OK with AT&T;, which it was intended to work with. My wife (the user)loves the simplicity of the design.

Reviews.Title: Calificación
Reviews.Author: Masterjack05
Reviews.Content: No muy buenas condiciones, a pesar de ser usado, considero deberían mandar los articulos en mejores condiciones; la tapa de la pila no calzaba, estaba un poco suelta, la bolita de dirección se pegaba al girar al lado izquierdo; de resto, si funciono el equipo, la carcasa en buenas condiciones y le actualice el software sin problemas

Reviews.Title: Liked at first
Reviews.Author: Bassbone456
Reviews.Content: So i got this phone about three weeks ago, and i like it despite having to press down on the scroll ball kinda hard to scroll up. then recently the selecting function on the scroll ball stopped working unless I pressed down really hard, and that only worked sometimes.

Reviews.Title: Product sold with defective and they never answer.
Reviews.Author: Mery
Reviews.Content: I did buy this Blackberry Curve 8310 GPS as unlocked phone but it came blocked. I sent them email and feedback, But never ever they give me back any answer. So, I paid with my money to unlocked it, wich is no fair and right. On my consideration, they are very responsable.

Reviews.Title: Didn't work
Reviews.Author: P. Sturgis
Reviews.Content: I received the phone in a decent amount of time. Unfortunately, the phone, which was labeled as "new" did not work. The box did not appear previously opened, but the phone would shut off every time I touched it. It was very frustrating since I had already backed it up from my saved settings. Wireovia did contact me after I placed a review on their website, but I had already returned the phone and was not interested in another product from this company. I really liked my old Blackberry but crossed over to the dark side and bought an iPhone. It works great every time.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8310 Unlocked Phone with GPS, 2MP Camera and Bluetooth - No Warranty - Red
Reviews.Author: CalidadNQ
Reviews.Content: Producto nuevo en muy buen estado. La compra - venta - entrega estuvo bien.Gracias a todas las personas involucradas para poder tener el producto comprado en mis manos.Saludos...Niz Quintero

Reviews.Title: Review of Blackberry Curve 8310 by Jesus Cornejo
Reviews.Author: Karl Smith "Risk Manager"
Reviews.Content: Excellent product. Was a gift for our daughter and she's extremely happy with it. As all blackberry products, high quality and at a reasonable good price. Just the shipment should be slightly faster.

Reviews.Title: BB Curve 8310 unlocked phone (ATT carrier)
Reviews.Author: in 'the Oaks
Reviews.Content: I really like using this phone.  THIS PHONE DOES REQUIRE A SIM CARD.  You can get a SIM card by calling ATT, and you only pay for the shipping.  If you walk into an ATT store, the SIM card is free.  I had no problem activating my BB 8310 Curve at the ATT store.(If you want to use Verizon as your carrier, you want the Blacberry 8330 Curve model.)I am in my 50's, and own a small, client-based business.  I travel weekly or daily, and need a reliable cell phone with good speech clarity and coverage, and a little more versatility than my flip phone.I love my IPod touch 5, but owning the IPod 5 has made me realize that I do NOT want to upgrade my flip-phone to an IPhone or anything similar...lol.  Since I can browse the web with my IPod or mini,  I don't need easy internet browsing to be a factor in choosing my business's cell phone.  But, I DO need a 'business workhorse', with great speech clarity, reliability, and easy email and texting.  And I wanted an actual, back-lit, qwerty keyboard.After doing a bit of research online, I decided on a Blackberry 8300 series Curve. ( I decided to try it out with a used one from a reliable seller with a return policy. )  My work cell phone is not used daily, so I chose to use ATT's GO Phone service while I try out the BB 8310 phone and the carrier range.  I pay only for the days I use the service.  This plan limits my access to data services, but so far I have rec'd text messages just fine.  The voice clarity and coverage in my rural area has been great here in Northern California.This phone feels great in my hand for use, charges quickly, and has a lot of accessories available.  Repair parts also seem easily available online, and the tools for installing, too.  As mentioned above, I ordered a used one to see if I liked the phone.  I used a seller with high ratings and a return policy/warranty.  (I was even able to find one in red.)  I feel that I found a great bargain.The camera works fine for a phone camera  (esp when compared to a flip phone!). It's not high resolution, but my IPod5 has camera, too, if I need better resolution.  I am trying out all of the bells and whistles BB was so famous for, and will update this review of the ATT model BB 8310 Curve phone after I have a chance to try out more of the data services, etc..The trackball works fine, and the auto on/off function works fine when I slide the phone in and out of the holster.  (I use the BB synthetic leather holster that Amazon sells as an ad-on item, with a BB skin case on the phone itself.)I have noticed that the voice dialing command feature understands my spoken words better than does SIRI on the IPod5.Overall, it's a really nice phone, with a LOT of memory and capabilities.  And these are really inexpensive these days, even if purchased new.  I like the fact that Blackberry is a North American company, too.I liked this 8310 Curve phone  so much, that I bought an unlocked Blackberry 8830 Curve Verizon phone to use with at home with our Verizon carrier!  (No red, though...I had to settle for pink.)

Reviews.Title: Trying out the SECOND BB Curve  sent
Reviews.Author: Classic City Cockatiels "Classic City Tiels"
Reviews.Content: Mixed feelings..first one sent did not charge, My repair shop looked at and saw was broken charge port,could not replace it. Was not until I contacted Amazon was a replacement promptly sent.No USB with first phone, had to request one for the second phone. Their weblink not very useful, is hard to get assistance from seller. Most help has come from my carrier T-Mobile, or just basic (on my own) web searches.Still issues with setting up regular on line email account thru gmail.Would  have wanted to know there were complications with setting up BB account Wanted to save by buying this way but will go thru carrier for next upgrade. Still issues with sending pics to and from phone. Seller to hard to reach for assistance

Reviews.Title: BLACKBERRY CURVE 8310
Reviews.Author: Blackberry User
Reviews.Content: This is a good Blackberry. It works fantastically. I can use BBM, Yahoo Messenger, MSN Messenger and AIM. I can get on Facebook, Email, Myspace, and Twitter. I can view videos, music, and radio. The volume button has stuck on high for me, which sucks! other than that, the phone works great!!

Reviews.Title: NOT WHAT THOUGHT
Reviews.Author: sunshine
Reviews.Content: WELL I PURCHASED THE BLACKBERRY CURVE 8310 AND WHEN I RECEIVED IT I WAS NOT HAPPY MY PHONE HAD DENTS AND THE COVER WOULDN'T CLOSE DOWN ALL THE WAY IF I PURCHASE SOMETHING AND PAY GOOD MONE3Y I THINK THE PHONE SHOULD BE IN BETTER CONDITION.

Reviews.Title: N/A
Reviews.Author: Ej
Reviews.Content: The phone looked exactly like it was online when it arrived.it was a perfect gift and works very well miles away.

Reviews.Title: No wi-fi!  Really?
Reviews.Author: Brave Warrior "Brave Warrior"
Reviews.Content: I got this for by boyfriend as a gift.  He already had a T-Mobile sim card from a flip phone, but hated texting on it.  First, his address did not open up in the Blackberry.  Then we tried to open wi-fi and there is none on this phone unless you pay by the minute to T-mobile.  Since this phone was advertised as a unlocked phone, and the person purchasing it would be using an already existing sim card, THAT GPS THAT NEEDS WI-FI WOULD NOT BE LISTED AS A FEATURE. As far as I can tell, that means the GPS won't work either without a monthly package from T-Mobile. That also means you can't load apps and no Blackberry Messenger.Otherwise, I guess he likes the phone.  I, however, feel ripped off.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Wendy
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cell phone from CellPhonesCheap, which allows me to say how much I love the phone! I had returned another Blackberry 8310 earlier this week and it was in awful condition. So this is an awesome phone, the curve just is, but the seller made that possible. I would recommend this phone.  Just know that this AT&T; version has no wifi! It is unlocked and working great on the Tmobile server though. It came with a genuine wall charger, not a horrible aftermarket one. Another plus.

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: Pedro Ortiz
Reviews.Content: This product needed maintenance is out of order, before worked good, but i had pay it. The next time i Will buy new.

Reviews.Title: I bought this blackberry for my self
Reviews.Author: Teresa L Zermeno
Reviews.Content: I love the phone, but can't do the Bluetooth yet. I like the voice command. i can tell it to shut off that's about it. I do love the phone and that's all that matters.

Reviews.Title: Good phone for a person who doesn't need wifi all the time
Reviews.Author: Marguerite Medina
Reviews.Content: Took the phone to Argentina and bought a sim card and airtime in a street kiosk and it was helpful.  The phone, refurbished, looks brand new.  It really is a nice phone.  Camera is good.  I didn't use it for the internet, just for calling, but if you're going out of the country and need to call, get an unlocked, refurbished phone with a camera and it's great.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8310
Reviews.Author: Michael B. Kemokai
Reviews.Content: The phone work well and meet my expectation. It was a gift for my in-laws. They were happy to have received it.

Reviews.Title: So so
Reviews.Author: Taipang Luy
Reviews.Content: Not very good for the above items. Some products did not work so well like how I wanted it to.

Reviews.Title: Excellent condition
Reviews.Author: Dahliarose
Reviews.Content: I love this product..The condition is excellent, brand new and I am very satisfied. i highly recommend to everyone. Thank you and More Power.

Reviews.Title: yes nice phone
Reviews.Author: nancy rivera
Reviews.Content: yes my grandson loved this item in very good condition i would recommend it to anyone is working very good would recommend it .thanks

Reviews.Title: Hmmm . . .
Reviews.Author: Keith Kennedy
Reviews.Content: This unit looked like the real deal - and who knows, maybe it was.  But it had trackball problems within 3 months - nothing like my first "genuine" unit where those issues didn't arise until 3+ years.  Other than that, it was fine.

Reviews.Title: My unlocked phone
Reviews.Author: patricia ogarro
Reviews.Content: I don't know what happened, but I try to use it with my AT&T; prepaid cardYou can't hear properly the other person can't hear you, then it keep cutting offSo that's really annoying as of right now it just sits in my drawer, may be I should of returned itBut I guess it's too late now

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Leverrier
Reviews.Content: Good for the price that you paid, I understand that is not the most functional phone but for my mom is ok.

Reviews.Title: sim-less
Reviews.Author: MORE  DIOP
Reviews.Content: I hate it because it doesn't take a sim card. I wasted my money for something I cannot use. Product didn't have all the details.

Reviews.Title: Maria Couto
Reviews.Author: Maria Andreina
Reviews.Content: A process very good, i am satisfied with the purchase. The product it's in good state and totally new, thak you

Reviews.Title: UnlockedCellPhoneKings
Reviews.Author: jexel daboin
Reviews.Content: El teléfono es usado tiene sucio dentro de la pantalla, llego en la fecha pautada, funciona bien en Venezuela con la operadora movilnet.

Reviews.Title: horrible product
Reviews.Author: J. Brighenti "JB2"
Reviews.Content: didn't have the thing for long before the mouse cursor ball failed, bought more, another failed after a 3 weeks.  the keys got jammed up, difficult to press and i couldn't send accurate e-mails with letters like "e" and "s" not working, the camera was beyone terrible, and overall it was poorly made and i wish i never would have spent the money on this piece of junk.

Reviews.Title: bb
Reviews.Author: torry "latorry boston"
Reviews.Content: pk i am a big big blackberry fan i love bb love the style of them i love the stuff you can do on them love this one for the color and just the way it is made

Reviews.Title: Crackberry, crackberry get me off crack
Reviews.Author: Lenny's review
Reviews.Content: I thought this would be a good item since it could be used with a prepaid account, but the problem is not all of the features can be used with the account, since the phone came from one carrier, and when used with another, it is not fully functional. Also, sometimes the system would just shut down (not sure if that was the phone), and it is not user-friendly if you have poor eyesight or big fingers.

Reviews.Title: wouldn't buy it again
Reviews.Author: Anica Jandric "Bob N"
Reviews.Content: I had this phone for a year , and could say I barely used it. On line browsing was bad, so  gave up on that and simply just used it for texting.Tracking ball stopped working took it to my provider, changed the tracking ball and still didn't work. So worse phone I ever had. Wouldn't recommend it to ANYONE.Also I believe when i bought it it wasn't new, there were many things indicating so.Even though it was sold as new.

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: milton
Reviews.Content: Very bad experience. Atter receive the item, it doesn't work properly. Frequently it turn it self off. After one week it turn it self off for ever. I decided to turn it back and request a replacement. Untill today (December 7 th, 2011) I doesn 't receive any replacement.

Reviews.Title: niceeee
Reviews.Author: kenneth
Reviews.Content: for the price is a very nice piece, i will recomned any one to purches as a gift...or for daily use

Reviews.Title: WORST PURCHASE EVER!
Reviews.Author: Indira Broch "Indi"
Reviews.Content: I BOUGHT THIS CELLPHONE BACK IN DECEMBER, CONTACTED THEM IN JANUARY FOR A RETURN, I WAS OUT OF THE COUNTRY (THAT'S WHY I BOUGHT IT UNLOCKED) WE COULDN'T USE THAT PHONE FOR NOTHING, IT DIDN'T TAKE CHARGE SO OBVIOUSLY WE COULND'T USE IT. I CONTACTED THEM THEY GAVE ME A RETURN NUMBER, AND THEN A FEW MONTHS LATER WHEN I CAME BACK, THEY TOLD ME NO! IT WAS TOO LATE AND IT WAS NOT IN THE SISTEM! BULL CRAP. THEY DIDN'T WANT TO RETURN IT. THE SOLD ME A CRAPPY PHONE OHHH AND WITH THE WRONG BATTERY, WHICH THEY NEVER REPLACED...SO FROM THE BEGINING IT WAS JUST PROBLEMS! NOW IM STUCK WITH A SHI..Y PHONE! CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS HORRIBLE TO DEAL WITH! I GUESS THAT'S WHAT HAPPES WHEN YOU DEAL WITH CROOKS!

Reviews.Title: Cannot give an opinion
Reviews.Author: Lina Hall
Reviews.Content: I guess it was really good, but it did not work with the cell company I have.  Too bad, because I really liked the way it looked.

Reviews.Title: Bueno
Reviews.Author: Elena
Reviews.Content: Adquiri este telefono hace un par de meses pero no le habia activado hasta un par de semanas atras, luego que le hice la actualización del software me dejó de funcionar el edge. Lejos de eso todo bien. El empaque y el envío bien aunque no en su caja de Blackberry original

Reviews.Title: Great Customer Service
Reviews.Author: MICHELLE C YOUNG
Reviews.Content: Rec'd phone today! Sooner than anticipated. Had issues with my billing and contact information, but  Wireovia.com and Amazon notified me immediately.The phone looks great. It's a gift so I'll have to wait and see if there are any issues with the product, but Wireovia included their contact info and proper procedures for returns if there as any problems. There is also a 90-day warranty and an option to extend to 12 months.

Reviews.Title: no puedo berificar la procedencia de mi equipo
Reviews.Author: Rene Ochoa Mayo
Reviews.Content: Buy two phones and one in Venezuela is reported as lost, sincethe month of March 2011 For her series was blocked in theTelephone Companies, no message after I did I put it in service.How can I solve this problem

Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: Mercantil "safiro"
Reviews.Content: I enjoyng my bb cel phone that i bought for my wife brithday

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
2G GSM: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
QWERTY keyboard, Trackball navigation, Blackberry Maps, Document viewer (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF), Media player (MP4/WMV/H.263/H.264/MP3/WAV/eAAC+/WMA), Organizer.
Camera: 2 MP, 1600x1200 pixels, LED flash.
Internal Memory: 64 MB ROM, MicroSD expandable (4 GB max).
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 8310 Unlocked Phone with GPS, 2MP Camera and Bluetooth - No Warranty - Red
